amendatorysection.catchline: County or district health department; termination; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: A county or district health department established under sections 71-1626 to 71-1636 may be terminated, following a public hearing, by a majority vote of the county board members for any county having a health department or of the majority of county boards having a district health department. A city-county health department may be terminated as provided by the agreement between the county and the city.
